TITLE: Episode 12 - New Year, Less Me
DESCRIPTION: I'm back! Well, most of me is, and in this episode I talk about the direction of the podcast for 2020, why the Anti-War left still isn't in existence, Harvey Weinsten's recent sex crime charges, the United Methodist Church's possible gay denomination and then we briefly discuss the loss that is not really a loss as Lizzo leaves Twitter.
